## ImageDefinition interface

Define an image (e.g. icon).

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export interface ImageDefinition 
```

## Properties

|  Property | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  [atlas](./harp-datasource-protocol.imagedefinition.atlas.md) | string | Url of JSON file containing the texture atlas |
|  [preload](./harp-datasource-protocol.imagedefinition.preload.md) | boolean | <code>true</code> to start loading at init tile, <code>false</code> to lazily wait until required. |
|  [url](./harp-datasource-protocol.imagedefinition.url.md) | string | Url to load content from. |
